name: The Adventures of Kidd Norm
description: Kidd Norm was an ordinary kid, until that all changed. One day, Kidd found himself in a strange world, unfamiliar to any he had seen before. Anxious, he pressed on, hoping to find a way back home. One thing I am aware of but unable to fix: the weapon shoots, but does not show on screen. It still has the particle, sound, and does damage to enemies still. I could not find out a way to get the projectile to show on screen.
